title: The Telephone
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, Denis Ward and David Cons
brief_description: An elementary description of the emission and use of sound waves for distant communication, and the early telephone invented by Alexander Graham Bell. The progress of modern telephones and speech amplification are also included in this film.
